ff520b3af8bea096dc485c6266bee152 (03:11): basically how do i line the text up vertically with the image
ff520b3af8bea096dc485c6266bee152 (03:11): i used to do it in a table but im trying to get away from those
8905008e00e6be22f585fe93cba1037f (03:12): set the image to float: left;

7049adecafa952f177c12843254f99ca (03:35): I'm impressed
7049adecafa952f177c12843254f99ca (03:35): our designer who just learned CSS this month actually optimized part of our css
4f955d6d4d503bdf2d4097369b9d19f1 (03:36): Cool, what did he end up doing?
7049adecafa952f177c12843254f99ca (03:38): she just combined a rule that says html, body { margin:0; padding: 0} with my custom zip rule
7049adecafa952f177c12843254f99ca (03:39): html, body, p, div, table, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, dl, dd, dt, ul, ol, li, pre, form, object
7049adecafa952f177c12843254f99ca (03:39): { margin: 0; padding: 0; border: none; }
7049adecafa952f177c12843254f99ca (03:39): if you knew them, you'd be impressed too
